name: Running Machine Simulator 3D
description:
If you want to get into shape and approve something really exciting, you should try a treadmill.
Come to the gym and toss sportsmen from fitness equipment and become the star of treadmill running!

Tap as fast as you can to move faster. Be ready for unexpected circumstances, such as blackouts and spooky things. You have powerful bonuses to become the fastest: use boosters that make you stronger or make your rivals weaker. Some sportsmen can be quite persistent. Do your best to toss them from the treadmill within the time available.

Running Machine Simulator 3D Features:

- Fast-speed treadmill to run
- Strong sportsmen to compete with
- Great fall-down effects
- Funny rag doll design

Go to the gym and toss sportsmen from the treadmill, don't let them win the running!
